categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Imperial Compulink was a type of communications system used by the Sector Plexus branch of the Galactic Empire's Imperial Intelligence organization. It was used in combination with other systems like the HoloNet and a network of communications droids.

The Imperial Compulink was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon through the 2018 roleplaying supplement  Dawn of Rebellion, published by Fantasy Flight Games. The system also existed in the Star Wars Legends continuity as the Imperial CompLink, being first mentioned in the 1989 Imperial Sourcebook, which was authored by Greg Gorden and published by West End Games.
